definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91
erhua variant of 恐怖片[kong3 bu4 pian4]

sentences.english: Why are some people very recreant can still you like to see horror piece?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼有的人很膽小可還是喜歡看恐怖片？

sentences.english: My father got such a fright when he was watching a horror film.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸看恐怖片嚇了巨大的一眺。

sentences.english: Horror films and thrillers and science fiction.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖片和驚險片還有科幻片。

sentences.english: Why should non-horror aficionados watch the series?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼非恐怖片愛好者也應該看看這個系列？

sentences.english: This makes the scariness of a horror film quantifiable.
sentences.chinese: 這樣就能把這部恐怖片讓人產生的恐懼感量化。

sentences.english: And Lionsgate has achieved a highly visible leadership position in the horror genre.
sentences.chinese: 並且，獅門在恐怖片領域也取得了極高的領導地位。

sentences.english: It was like watching a horror movie, except I was the monster.
sentences.chinese: 那就像是在看一部恐怖片，而我就是片中的那個怪獸。

sentences.english: How to solve see horror piece the sequela that stay?
sentences.chinese: 怎麼解決看完恐怖片留下的後遺症？

sentences.english: Wu Ye Xiong Ling is a thriller.
I don't like scary and violent movies.
sentences.chinese: 我討厭恐怖片和暴力片。

sentences.english: It remains to be seen whether or not Original Sin will become a thriller classic.
sentences.chinese: 《原罪》能否成爲恐怖片的經典仍需拭目以待。

sentences.english: Usually when we consider Thai movies we think of kungfu flicks and horror films.
sentences.chinese: 通常，我們提起泰國電影就會想到功夫片和恐怖片。

sentences.english: Ann Hui, a Hong Kong moviemaker, has cut a ghost scene from her new thriller.
sentences.chinese: 香港電影導演許鞍華在她的恐怖片新作剪去一場鬼戲。

sentences.english: Keira's next role came in this private-school thriller.
sentences.chinese: 凱拉的下一個角色出現在一個私立學校恐怖片裏。

sentences.english: but I do want to be a film director specializing in,  like, thrillers, kind of horror.
sentences.chinese: 但我希望能夠成爲專門拍攝驚險或恐怖片的導演。

sentences.english: Have good-looking sinister plot piece ah? Want Japanese horror piece.
sentences.chinese: 有沒有好看的鬼片啊？要日本恐怖片。

definition: a form of automatic writing in which two or more participants hold a single pen over a sheet of paper and invite a spirit to write answers to their questions/a spirit so invited
